nodes.text: The Battle of Jaga's Cluster was one of the final battles of the Mandalorian Wars. Despite the fact that the Mandalorians would soon lose the war and be almost entirely wiped out, they still managed an impressive victory against the Old Republic, destroying an entire enemy fleet group. It was at Jaga's Cluster that the Mandalorian commander, Cassus Fett, became the most-wanted man in the galaxy for his killing of the Republic fleet commander in hand-to-hand combat, and subsequent flight into deep space.
